text: The Copa Petrobras São Paulo is a tennis tournament held in São Paulo, Brazil from 2009 until 2010. Between 2004 and 2008, it was held in Aracaju except for the 2007 edition which was held in Belo Horizonte. The event is part of the ATP Challenger Tour and is played on outdoor red clay courts. ==Past finals== ===Singles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion !width="200"|Runner-up !width="100"|Score |- | 2010 || Marcos Daniel || Thomaz Bellucci || 6–1, 3–6, 6–3 |- | 2009 || Thomaz Bellucci || Nicolás Lapentti || 6–4, 6–4 |- |2008 || Paul Capdeville || Thiago Alves || 7–5, 6–4 |- |2007 || Nicolas Devilder || Marcel Granollers || 6–2, 6–7, 7–6 |- |2006 || Sergio Roitman || Boris Pašanski || 6–1, 6–3 |- |2005 || Boris Pašanski || Nicolás Lapentti || 7–6, 7–5 |- |2004 || Nicolás Lapentti || Júlio Silva || 6–2, 6–2 |} ===Doubles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion !width="200"|Runner-up !width="100"|Score |- | 2010 | Franco Ferreiro André Sá | Rui Machado Daniel Muñoz-de la Nava | 3–6, 7–6(2), [10–8] |- | 2009 | Franco Ferreiro Ricardo Mello | Diego Junqueira David Marrero | 6–3, 6–3 |- | 2008 | Juan-Martín Aranguren Franco Ferreiro | Thiago Alves João Souza | 6–4, 6–4 |- | 2007 | Marcel Granollers Santiago Ventura | Adrián García Leonardo Mayer | 6–3, 6–3 |- | 2006 | Máximo González Sergio Roitman | Tomas Behrend Marcel Granollers | 7–6, 3–6, [10–6] |- | 2005 | Máximo González Sergio Roitman | Carlos Berlocq Martín Vassallo Argüello | 6–4, 6–7, 6–3 |- | 2004 | Enzo Artoni Ignacio González King | Juan Pablo Guzmán Santiago Ventura | 6–4, 6–2 |} == External links == *Official website *ITF search Category:ATP Challenger Tour Category:Petrobras Category:Sport in São Paulo Category:Tennis tournaments in Brazil Category:2004 establishments in Brazil Category:Clay court tennis tournaments
